Description

Allowed sender kinds for @Sender annotation.
BooleanTypeParser<S>
Type parser for Boolean arguments.
CommandArgument
Represents a command argument with its properties and permission requirements.

Builder for CommandArgument.
CommandExecution<S>
Execution context for builder-defined commands.
CommandExecutor<S>
Executes a command action built by the command builder API.
CommandInfo
Annotation for command metadata.
CommandLogger
Lightweight logger interface for command engine diagnostics.
CommandManager<S>
Manages registration, execution, and tab completion of commands.
CommandPlatform<S>
Platform hooks required by the command engine.
CommandResult
Represents the result of a command execution, including status and message.
CommandSpec<S>
Builder spec for a command.
CommandSpec.Builder<S>
 
CompareMode
How to compare values when evaluating permission conditions.
ComparisonUtils
Helper methods for comparing argument values without Bukkit dependencies.
DefaultValue
Annotation to specify a default value for a command argument.
DynamicCommand
Command implementation backed by a CommandSpec builder.
EnumTypeParser<S>
Generic enum parser to avoid registering a parser per enum type.
Greedy
Marks a command argument as greedy, consuming the remainder of the input (joined with spaces).
HelpCommandBase
Shared help command implementation for all platforms.
HelpCommandSupport
Static helpers for building formatted help output.
HelpCommandSupport.HelpResult
Result of help rendering.
IntegerTypeParser<S>
Type parser for Integer arguments.
ListTypeParser<S>
Type parser for handling list suggestions like {value1,value2,value3}.
LongTypeParser<S>
Type parser for Long arguments.
MagicCommand
Abstract base class for all custom commands.
MagicCommand.SubCommandInfo
Holds information about a subcommand and its method.
MagicPermissionDefault
Mirrors Bukkit PermissionDefault for platform-agnostic code.
MagicSender
Platform-agnostic command sender wrapper.
MagicSenderAdapter
Adapter for converting platform-specific sender instances into MagicSender.
MagicSenderAdapters
Registry for MagicSenderAdapter instances.
Option
Declares a parameter as a named option (e.g.
OptionalArgument
Annotation to mark a command argument as optional.
ParamName
Allows overriding a parameter name for help/usage display.
Permission
Annotation to specify permission requirements for commands or arguments.
PermissionConditionType
Declarative condition types for argument/command permissions.
Sender
Marks a command parameter as the executing sender.
SenderMismatchException
Thrown when the executing sender does not match the required sender type.
StringTypeParser<S>
Type parser for String arguments.
SubCommand
Annotation for marking a method as a subcommand handler.
SubCommandSpec<S>
Builder spec for a subcommand.
SubCommandSpec.Builder<S>
 
Suggest
Annotation to provide autocomplete suggestions for command arguments.
TypeParser<S,T>
Unified interface for parsing command arguments and providing suggestions.
TypeParserRegistry<S>
Registry for managing type parsers that handle both parsing and suggestions.
